Data¶

Pulling data directly from WattTime

/get_grid_data¶

Returns marginal grid data for a given balancing authority and time period WIP

/get_index_data¶

Returns real-time data for a given balancing authority and time period WIP

/get_forecast_data¶

Returns marginal forecast data for a given balancing authority and time period WIP

/get_historical_data¶

Returns historical data for a given balancing authority WIP

/shift_predictions¶

Finds the greenest start time for GPU runs shifted based on geographic region, time, or both.

carbonaware-API
